name: intgr-cdb.yml
configuration:
spring:
  datasource:
    url: jdbc:jtds:sqlserver://10.28.76.25/baza_sou;user=CMS_user;password=1q2w3e4r;
    username: CMS_user
    password: 1q2w3e4r
    hikari:
      connection-test-query: select 1
      connection-timeout: 1000
  jpa:
    database: sql_server
    hibernate:
      ddl-auto: none
    database-platform: org.hibernate.dialect.SQLServerDialect
    properties:
      hibernate:
        temp:
          use_jdbc_metadata_defaults: false
  jackson:
    serialization:
      fail_on_empty_beans: false
    deserialization:
      read_date_timestamps_as_nanoseconds: false
  jmx:
    default-domain: cdb-app-jmx
  application:
    name: nttm-intgr-cdb
server:
  port: 8086
cdb:
  by_kod: sou_GetParamsKO_by_kod
  by_nw: sou_GetParamsKO_by_nw
  CMSFind_KO_1: sou_CMSFind_KO_1
  lpSymb: LP_Symb
  lpZona: LP_Zona
  uzelLp: Uzel_LP
  souClientLow: sou_ClientLow
app:
  jwt:
    expire: ${JWT_EXPIRE:90000000} #90000000ms = 25hrs
    secret: ${JWT_SECRET_KEY:z%C*F-JaNdRgUkXn2r5u8x/A?D(G+KbPeShVmYq3s6v9y&E)H@McQfTjWnZr4h}
    server: http://localhost:8080/nttm-auth-jwt/api/
management:
  endpoints:
    web:
      path-mapping:
        prometheus: metrics
      base-path: /
      exposure:
        include: prometheus
  health.solr.enabled: false
logging:
  config: classpath:log4j2-dev.yaml
  level:
    org.hibernate: error
    org.hibernate.SQL: error
    org.zalando.logbook: info
logbook:
  format:
    style: http
  exclude:
    - "**/metrics"
